history.proof: intros y x z H1 H2. srun best use: plus1, star_plus_plus.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : star R x y H2 : R y z The term "R" has type "relation X" while it is expected to have type "star R ?y ?z".

original: intros y x z H1 H2. apply (star_trans _ R y); auto.
